Title: Cabin Fever
Overview: While staying at a remote cabin for a week-long vacation, a group of five college friends succumb to an infectious, flesh-eating disease.
Tagline: You can't run from what's inside.
production_companies: Armory Films, Pelican Point Media, Contend
Cast: Matthew Daddario, Samuel Davis, Dustin Ingram
